title: Deep sea dive
brief_description: Explore the last great frontier on earth - under the sea. Join Spin, an animated globe-on-the-go (voice provided by Dudley Moore), as he explores the world’s ocean from surface to seafloor. Learn about the great whales, friendly dolphins, scary sharks, and all the oceans’ amazing treasures. Brilliant cinematography and magical music videos make this undersea world of wonders come alive. Suitable for Lower-Middle Primary level students.
